channel.title: What would be a great way to learn java?
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt]what would be a great way, to learn java from i already learned something from websites but that is boring whit al that reading stuff somebody got a java programming tut in a video or something like that that would be much more fun
- theowned[/size][/center]

item.title: What would be a great way to learn java?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Java is just like a normal language. First you need to read and do the boring part. Then you can make awesome programs.
Just google ‘Java pdf’ and you will find many Java books.

Read full topic
item.source: What would be a great way to learn java?

item.title: What would be a great way to learn java?
